definitions.definition: A fireproof barrier used to prevent the spread of fire between or through buildings , structures, electrical substation transformers, or within an aircraft or vehicle.
The software that monitors traffic in and out of a private network or a personal computer and allows or blocks such traffic depending on its perceived threat .
A hypothetical phenomenon where an observer falling into a black hole encounters high-energy quanta at or near the event horizon .

main_definition: ( architecture ) A fireproof barrier used to prevent the spread of fire between or through buildings , structures, electrical substation transformers, or within an aircraft or vehicle.
secondary_definitions: ( computer security ) The software that monitors traffic in and out of a private network or a personal computer and allows or blocks such traffic depending on its perceived threat .
( physics ) A hypothetical phenomenon where an observer falling into a black hole encounters high-energy quanta at or near the event horizon .
